idea-plugin.name: EcoAndroid
idea-plugin.description:
Detects and refactors energy-related code-smells on Java source code.
The results from the inspection can be seen as warnings in the source code or can be run manually by the developer.

It supports the detection and correction of the following cases:

  • Dynamic Retry Delay: increase the interval between attempts to access a resource, avoiding trying to constantly access a resource that most likely went down.
  • Push Over Poll: use push notifications instead of actively querying resources, such as polling.
  • Reduce Size: reduce the size of the data being transferred as much as possible, therefore reducing the energy being used in the transfer.
  • Cache: store data that is being used frequently, which means a lower energy consumption since it reduces the amount of code executed and a lower number of accesses to retrieve information.
  • Avoid Graphics and Animations: displaying graphics and animations are resources with an high energy consumption.reducing this resources as much as possible will save energy.
